channel.title: CloudForms on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CloudForms on Martin's Blog

item.title: Import CloudForms into rhevm
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: [bash] [root@rhevm03 export]# cat /etc/exports /var/lib/exports/iso *(rw) /export/rhev_import_export_disk *(rw,sync,no_subtree_check,all_squash,anonuid=36,anongid=36) /export/template *(rw,sync,no_subtree_check,all_squash,anonuid=36,anongid=36) [root@rhevm03 export]# engine-image-uploader -N cfme5351 -e export-nfs-rhevm -v -m upload /tmp/cfme-rhevm-5.3-51.x86_64.rhevm.ova [/bash] 然后从Web Console上导入这个模板，创建一个目标规格的虚拟机。
